text: And, we have no such thing as a budget anymore. Our manager freaks when we show him the bill. We're lavish to the bone, but all our money goes back into the product.
author: Freddie Mercury

text: Labor was the first price, the original purchase - money that was paid for all things.
author: Adam Smith

text: My other family is Fleetwood Mac. I don't need the money, but there's an emotional need for me to go on the road again. There's a love there we're a band of brothers.
author: Stevie Nicks

text: Countries have lost their culture because what they wanted was money. Money became the running theme in every country and culture was sacrificed.
author: Yoko Ono

text: My generation will actually be the first generation that is tamer than the one that came before it, and it will probably be poorer less fun and less money.
author: Shia LaBeouf
